name: La Blanca
description: La Blanca by Kannabia Seed Company is a balanced hybrid with personality. Created by crossing Black Domina x Snow White x Great White Shark, La Blanca holds true to its lineage, offering a blanket of white, snowy trichomes and a funky fragrance of sweet citrus and pungent earth. Kannabia boosts the flowering time of this strain through the addition of its Black Domina, giving La Blanca a round 60-day flowering time. La Blanca is also quite mold and pest-resistant, making it an ideal strain for seasonal outdoor grows. Enjoy its stoney effects to stimulate appetite and relax muscles.
descriptionPlain: La Blanca by Kannabia Seed Company is a balanced hybrid with personality. Created by crossing Black Domina x Snow White x Great White Shark, La Blanca holds true to its lineage, offering a blanket of white, snowy trichomes and a funky fragrance of sweet citrus and pungent earth. Kannabia boosts the flowering time of this strain through the addition of its Black Domina, giving La Blanca a round 60-day flowering time. La Blanca is also quite mold and pest-resistant, making it an ideal strain for seasonal outdoor grows. Enjoy its stoney effects to stimulate appetite and relax muscles.

highlightedReviews.text: Very strong nice long high. Felt like the typical hybrid but leaning towards sativa side.

Mellow high with mild to moderate pain relieving qualities.  For me La Blanca is a functional day time buzz allowing for productivity & daily activities of life without creating a fog in my flow of thoughts.  A good tip for anyone who uses this or any cannabis for daily use is to pack extra snacks.  La Blanca has been on the shelves for about 2 years and I have been lucky enough to try a few times.  Not a huge fan of the bud structure being very dense making it harder to roll joints which I am a big fan of.  This trait would not stop me from purchasing more of this lovely zesty marigold smothered in the light scent of honey.  Or something nice like that =)
